data.title: Add support for importing submesh node instances from fbx files
data.body: Use the samurai model with equipment as a test case. Also, once landed update example: WebView 3D.

data.title: Selecting a texture in the texture asset browser from the material editor closes the material folder in the content pane
Dragging assets into the content area of project panel doesn't import
data.body: This is due to the content drop area only being on a small portion of the content area widget. Dropping directly onto the folder in the folder pane imports correctly.

data.title: Consolidate window management and other common Graphics subsystem code into a Graphics base class
data.body: Right now, there is significant duplication between OGL, D3D9, D3D11 graphics subsystems in terms of Window management, creation, etc.  This should be split out to a common graphics base class

data.title: Site Licenses: Add method for site keys which do not require activation
data.body: This will likely involve shipping site key SHA's in the editor build and matching key entered to these SHA hashes

data.title: When editor/player is put on a secondary monitor in prefs, ensure monitor is available otherwise reset to monitor 0
data.body:
Sample prefs JSON for editor window on second monitor:

"editorWindow": {
    "x": 2880,
    "y": 23,
    "width": 1240,
    "height": 775,
    "monitor": 1,
    "maximized": false
  },

data.title: Squash Windows build warnings
data.body: There are many warnings on windows, mostly related to 64 bit size_t conversion, etc.  These need to be fixed!

data.title: Fix node path so command doesn't see it as a switch
UIView should have GRAVITY_ALL so responds to root resize properly, cleanups
Look into layout/sizing issues for widgets with TBWidget instances as parents (and not TBLayout)
data.body: It is possible to parent a widget to a TBWidget instance and get some basic gravity based layout, though sizes, etc for these widgets does not seem to be updating properly.  Perhaps check for GRAVITY_ALL on children and resize when layout is invalidated.

data.title: Zero length files cause player builds to quit
data.body: Having zero length files such as .gitkeep in the project currently cause the player build to quit.  This needs to be confirmed and then whatever is causing the build to stop fixed, either by including the zero length file in the build (preferred) or if that causes significant issues, skipping the files.

data.title: Fixing UIView resize behavior.
data.body:
A UIView size object never gets updated after it's created. Since many other UIWidget objects size themselves based on their parent's size, any resize causes the UI to misbehave.

Many of the AtomicExamples suffer from this problem, so for an example of what this PR fixes, try ParticleEmitter3D, which has buttons on the right side of the window. Re-size the window, or make it fullscreen, and the buttons stay where they were relative to the top-left corner of the window, so they no longer are on the right side of the screen. Another example is SpaceGame, where after startup, the menu screen (and Ok button) have similar behavior.

The AtomicEditor seems pretty good about keeping things in the right place, but even it suffers from this problem: Try making a subwindow appear, such as when the Player Output window appears when running the player, then resize the main editor window. The subwindow stays relative to where it was, which is fine, even expected. Then, close the subwindow and make it reappear (relaunch the player), and although .center() was called on it in the .ts file, it centers based on the original window size, not the new window size.

This PR fixes everything described above.

data.title: Fix for UITabContainer pages being incorrectly sized, initially
Moving the UI debug window to a static method (now that static method…
data.body: …s are supported! Thanks @mattbenic), hooking up debug window to development menu

data.title: Editor hangs when trying to open a project on OSX
data.body:
The editor will hang after the user selects a project to open from the native file dialog box (opened by the "Open" option from the "File" menu).

If the editor is then closed (or killed), and then relaunched, then the project can be correctly loaded from the "Recent Projects" list.

data.title: Add UI debug widget to Atomic Editor developer tools menu
Linux: Play button never changes back to play after running project the first time (see notes)
data.body: This could be related to #530, which should be looked at first to see if it fixes this issue

data.title: Improve JSBProperty::GetCasePropertyName case generation
data.body: Specifically, a rule that converts names like URLEnabled to: urlEnabled
